description:
Aweber is an opt-in email marketing service which is used by a variety of people in their daily business lives. For example:

  • Small Business Owners
  • Bloggers
  • Entrepreneurs

Being able to communicate via email with your customers and prospects is key to having a thriving growing business

Their web based tools are easy to use and are constantly being upgraded to ensure that you have the best platform available for you and your business

The aim of this course is to give you a solid foundation via the following training:

  • Introduction to Aweber
  • Opening Your Aweber Account
  • Overview of Your Admin Dashboard
  • Setting Up Your First List and Welcome Message to Your Subscriber
  • Adding Your Autoresponder Follow Up Messages
  • Setting Up Your List Sign Up Form
  • Taking Your List Sign Up Form Code and Placing it in Your Website
  • Setting Up a Broadcast Message
  • Checking Your Email Stats
  • Bonus Training
  • Course Confirmation

Get your email marketing off to a flying start by enrolling in "Beginners Email Academy" and let us help you start to grow your business today!
title: Beginners Email Academy
